our story
Red Crab Juicy Seafood
was born from a shared vision of three lifelong friends who grew up near the East Coast. Together, they decided to create a dining experience that captures the essence of true
seafood boil
. After years of experimenting with spices and seasonings, they found the perfect aromatic, spicy, and savory blend that would give
Red Crab
its signature flavor. This marked the beginning of an incredible journey into the hearts and palates of seafood lovers along the East Coast.
How We Started
Red Crab
first opened in Florida after our founders fell in love with
seafood boil
. Our founders realized that they had an opportunity to improve upon the flavor they loved. After a year of experimenting with spices and seasonings from all over the world, they finally found the perfect combination that would give
Red Crab
its signature flavor. THIS BLEND WAS AROMATIC, SPICY, AND SAVOURY – TOO GOOD NOT TO SHARE WITH THE WORLD. THUS CAME THE FIRST RED CRAB JUICY SEAFOOD, AND THE REST IS HISTORY!
Explore Our Menu
Our Journey
What Sets Us Apart
While many
seafood boil restaurants
rely on mass-produced seasoning packets from external vendors, we create all our seasonings in-house. Our signature
seafood boil
combines fresh, high-quality seafood with our secret in-house blend of spices and sauces.
Where Its Been
Since the opening of our first Red Crab in Florida, we have worked hard to bring our
seafood boil
experience to over 40 restaurants across the East Coast and Midwest. This has allowed us to connect with diverse communities that share our love for
seafood boil
.
Whats Next
As we continue to grow, we remain true to our roots, ensuring that every
Red Crab
reflects our dedication to quality and taste. Whether you’re celebrating a special occasion, enjoying a meal with friends, or simply craving
seafood boil
, we can’t wait to share our love for
seafood
with you!
